judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Crawley, Appellant.
Argued November 27, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
B. Lerner, with him Melvin Dildine, Assistant Defender, and 'Hermm I. Pollock, Defender, for appellant.
Michael M. Baylson, Assistant District Attorney, with him Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
November 12, 1968:
